item.title: The Fed’s Latest (Sort of) ‘Mission Accomplished’
item.description: The week of October 27, 2025: The Fed’s rate cut, climate policy, the FTC, tariffs, and much, much more.

item.title: How Princeton University Hijacked a Free-Speech Event
item.description: I helped create Princeton’s free-expression event for freshman orientation. The university turned it into yet another indoctrination session.

item.title: Dick Cheney, R.I.P.
item.description: The former vice president served the country for decades and had a profound influence on the nation’s response to September 11.

item.title: Trump’s Bizarre Pick for Surgeon General
item.description: Casey Means is into ‘psychedelic therapy’ and ‘full moon ceremonies.’
